description: Set one of the inputs for a task.
name: Set Task Input

part.documentation: The name of the input to add or update.
part.name: name

part.documentation: If no value is provided, any current input with that name is removed from the resource.
part.name: value[x]

text.div:
Set Task Input

OPERATION: Set Task Input

Set one of the inputs for a task.

URL: [base]/Task/[id]/$set-input

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
INinput1..*
INinput.name1..1string

The name of the input to add or update.

INinput.value[x]0..1Type

If no value is provided, any current input with that name is removed from the resource.
